item.title: About Me
item.author: paolo.enrico@gmail.com (home)
item.description:
Hey, I’m Paolo Fullone, a backend software engineer who builds robust systems with C# and .NET. Since diving into tech in 2022, I’ve designed microservices that handle millions of operations daily, streamlined real-time data streams, and mastered testing to ensure rock-solid APIs. My passion lies in solving tough problems with clean code and scalable architecture—think Kafka clusters or SignalR pipelines.

Before tech, I spent over 20 years leading procurement across Brazil and Mexico, managing complex projects and teams. That experience taught me to align stakeholders and deliver under pressure, skills I now bring to agile dev teams. Fluent in English, Spanish, and Portuguese, I thrive in international settings, bridging cultures to build better software.
